name: City Watch Captain
description: The City Watch Captain is a sturdy humanoid wearing a chain shirt, wielding a rapier and a light crossbow, with an air of authority.
memorable: Possesses the ability to command allies and create strategic advantages in battle.
goals: Maintains law and order while leading a group of law enforcement.
relations: Might serve alongside guards or other lawful creatures.
environment: Urban areas or cities requiring law enforcement.
strengths: Strong tactical insight and ability to influence combat dynamics with commands.
attacks: Uses rapier for melee attacks and light crossbow for ranged attacks, can force enemies to drop weapons.
most_powerful_ability: Tactical Insight allows advantageous initiative rolls and coordination of allied actions.
equipment: Chain shirt, rapier, and light crossbow.
senses: Noteworthy perception skill with a +4 modifier, maintaining a decent awareness of surroundings.
skills: Good at perceiving threats with a Perception skill modifier of +4.
additional_information: Ability to deal extra damage with rapier close to enemies.
Can issue commands to up to two allies to react strategically.
Advantage on initiative rolls enhances team coordination.
Allows allies to take their turn based on its initiative.
Utilizes multiple attacks through special actions.
